pullrequest.title: Support joint creation between nested model links in model editor

content.raw:
it's related to the `TODO` note in [SchematicView.cc:123](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/f29d56b3a959f6c2757059433074e4a5f93363cf/gazebo/gui/model/SchematicViewWidget.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#SchematicViewWidget.cc-123). 

I just removed it and reverted the to the old behavior where nested model links are displayed as individual boxes in the schematic view. It's something to be fixed but hopefully that's less confusing than before.
